mapper.insert: insert into mylecture (usernum, lecdenum,review, payok) values (#{usernum},#{lecdenum},null,"no");
mapper.update: update mylecture set payok = "ok", paytime = now() where usernum = #{usernum} AND payok ="no";
mapper.select: select mylecture.review , mylecture.star , mylecture.usernum, user.username, mylecture.paytime , user.userphoto from mylecture, user where mylecture.lecdenum=#{lecdenum} and payok="ok" and mylecture.usernum =user.usernum ;
mapper.update: update mylecture set star=#{star}, review=#{review} where usernum = #{usernum} AND lecdenum= #{lecdenum};
